content: {'id': '2eb52b36-51bb-3d7f-adbc-6fbede43110a', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "India's federal investigator charges Anil Ambani, former Yes Bank CEO in alleged loan fraud", 'description': '', 'summary': 'Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) said that Yes Bank invested over 50 billion rupees ($567.21 million) in two Ambani-controlled companies in 2017, with approval from the bank\'s former CEO Rana Kapoor, despite rating agencies flagging financial risks.  CBI said that Kapoor "abused" his position to channel Yes Bank\'s funds into financially troubled Ambani group firms, which in return extended concessional loans to companies linked to Kapoor\'s family.  The arrangement resulted in a loss of 27.97 billion Indian rupees ($317.29 million) to Yes Bank and led to unlawful gains for Ambani\'s firms and the companies linked to Kapoor\'s family, CBI said.', 'pubDate': '2025-09-18T16:27:50Z', 'displayTime': '2025-09-18T16:27:50Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/9f944743586344f26dc495e28c60a37f', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 485, 'caption': 'The logo of Yes Bank is pictured on the facade of its headquarters in Mumbai', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/QPVcmXZoIZgVohVV8iqU7A--~B/aD00ODU7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/9f944743586344f26dc495e28c60a37f', 'width': 800, 'height': 485, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/Tx7KXc8BixD9RjPRwUtaRQ--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/9f944743586344f26dc495e28c60a37f', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-federal-investigator-charges-anil-162750766.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/indias-federal-investigator-charges-anil-162750766.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '0330f2c2-9a3b-3751-9a9e-32907d188430', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "Japan's SMBC seeks RBI approval for 4.9% additional stake in Yes Bank, sources say", 'description': '', 'summary': "(Reuters) -Japan's Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation (SMBC) has sought approval from the Reserve Bank of India to acquire an additional 4.9% stake in Indiaâ€™s Yes Bank to take its total ownership in the bank to just under 25%, two sources aware of the matter told Reuters.  In May, SMBC inked a deal to take a 20% stake in the private lender for $1.6 billion, Yes Bank had announced in a stock exchange filing.  Yes Bank and the RBI didn't immediately respond to Reuters' emails seeking comments.", 'pubDate': '2025-07-15T08:21:36Z', 'displayTime': '2025-07-15T08:21:36Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/958899212e717cece8be154503e41c35', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 555, 'caption': 'A private security guard stands outside a branch of Yes Bank in New Delhi', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/PSv8McAM4EpO3BC9zODkVw--~B/aD01NTU7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/958899212e717cece8be154503e41c35', 'width': 800, 'height': 555, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/HZFkEVxDUema_IxRipgCKQ--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/958899212e717cece8be154503e41c35', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://sg.finance.yahoo.com/news/japans-smfg-eyes-1-1-082136040.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'SG', 'lang': 'en-SG'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/japans-smfg-eyes-1-1-082136040.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}
